short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables limitless text input to ChatGPT for bulk transformations, ideal for devs in language-specific refactoring.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables limitless text input to ChatGPT for bulk transformations, ideal for devs in language-specific refactoring.

允許無限制文本輸入至 ChatGPT 進行批量轉換，適用於特定語言重構的開發者。
